title: Parsley Bread Stuffing
description: Rich, meaty stuffing for a Turkey.
ingredients:
1 Neck, giblets and liver from turkey (about 1 pound)
2 cups water
1 tablespoon butter
½ cup finely chopped onion
½ cup sliced celery
3 qts butter crust bread, 2 days old, cut into ½ inch cubes
1 bunch parsley
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon thyme
½ teaspoon pepper
2 beaten eggs
steps:
Process neck, liver and giblets in water for 30 minutes
Grind meat
Pour cooked meat over bread
Add remaining dry ingredients
Toss to mix
Add eggs
Toss again and stuff
notes:
Can be put into a casserole dish instead of turkey
I remember tasting the stuffing for my dad before we went to church because he didn’t want to break his fast. We ground everything in a meat grinder. This was before anyone I knew had a food processor.
